hero.text: We use talent and technology to design and build startups globally

subText.text: We are a small team of individuals that brings together talents from Product Development, Software Engineering and UI/UX design.
Our mission is to make products that will bring delightful experiences to our users and apps that deliver revenue.

whatWeDo.title: Why we're here
whatWeDo.mainText: We work with founders around the globe

subText.text: “Conflux”, is another term for confluence, which means “the process of merging”.
In that note, we are here to work with people with big ideas and build beautiful products together.
